fields.name: Popular
fields.description: Cakes that are currently highly popular among customers, often due to their unique flavors, presentation, or overall customer satisfaction.

fields.name: Hottest
fields.description: The most sought-after cakes at the moment, often characterized by high demand and frequent purchases.

fields.name: Recent
fields.description: Newly added cakes to the catalog, highlighting the latest additions for customers to explore fresh offerings.

fields.name: Top Rated
fields.description: Cakes that have received the highest ratings from customers, often praised for their taste, quality, and presentation.

fields.name: Most Reviewed
fields.description: Cakes with the most customer reviews, providing a wealth of feedback and insights from other customers.

fields.name: Most Viewed
fields.description: Cakes that have attracted the most views on the website, indicating strong interest and curiosity from visitors.

fields.name: Editor's Choice
fields.description: Specially curated cakes recommended by the staff or culinary experts, selected for their exceptional quality or unique attributes.

fields.name: Limited Edition
fields.description: Cakes available for a limited time or in limited quantities, often featuring seasonal ingredients or special designs.

fields.name: Best Seller
fields.description: The top-selling cakes, favored by customers for their consistency in quality and flavor.

fields.name: Seasonal Favorites
fields.description: Cakes that are particularly popular during specific seasons or holidays, often featuring seasonal ingredients or themes.
